25% Omnivamp

+60% Critical Strike Chance, +10% Critical Strike Damage

+20 Ability Power
+5 mana per basic attack

+40 Armor
-75% damage from incoming crits

Crafted.Effect:
+150 Health

Crafted.Name: Gargoyle Stoneplate

Crafted.Name: Titan's Resolve
Crafted.Effect:
On attacking or taking damage: gain 1 stack
+2 Attack Damage and +2 Ability Power per stack
Max 25 stacks
At full stacks, +25 armor and +25 magic resist

Crafted.Name: Shroud of Stillness
Crafted.Effect: Combat start: shoot beam at enemies, hit units have +35% to max mana until they cast

Crafted.Name: Protector's Vow
Crafted.Effect:
Once per combat, at 50% Health: allies within 3 hexes gain:
* 20% max health shield for up to 2 seconds
* +15 armor and +15 magic resist (for the rest of combat)

+20 Ability Power

Combat start: taunt enemies within 4 hexes

Crafted.Name: Banshee's Claw
